abstract: Study by anti-corruption monitoring group Transparency International finds military forces of 30 countries that supply most soldiers and police officers to United Nations peacekeeping operations are also among those most susceptible to corruption.

headline.print_headline: Armies Used by U.N. Fail Group’s Test
headline.main: Armies Used by U.N. Fail Watchdog Group’s Test

snippet: A new study found that the armed forces that provide the most United Nations peacekeepers are also among the world’s most susceptible to corruption.
lead_paragraph: A new study found that the armed forces that provide the most United Nations peacekeepers are also among the world’s most susceptible to corruption.
